TopicSection.Name: BodyText
TopicSection.Content:
About this Sample

This sample Document! X project produces a set of reference documentation for the Microsoft Scripting Runtime COM Component. The generated documentation combines:

  1. HelpString values contained in the COM Component itself;
  2. Content generated automatically by Document! X;
  3. Content authored for specific classes, structures, enumerations and members in a Document! X Content File;
  4. Conceptual Topics.

Editing the Content in this Sample

To edit content in the sample Document! X Content File
  • Open Document! X;
  • Open this sample project;
  • Expand the Content Files section of the Project Explorer;
  • Right click on the Content File and choose the Edit option;

The Content File will be opened for edit. Select a class, structure, enumeration or member from the tree on the left of the editor to display and edit content for that item.

To edit content in the conceptual Topics (such as this one)
  • Open Document! X;
  • Open this sample project;
  • Expand the Topics section of the Project Explorer;
  • Right click on a Topic and choose the Edit option.

The Topic will be opened for edit.

Building this Sample

Click on the Build ribbon button to build the output for this sample.
